item.title: ABS Filament
item.description: Our ABS Filament is a good material to start with because it’s easy to use and performs well on most prints. ABS filament is the perfect material for 3D printing of strong and durable prints. It has great mechanical properties like high toughness and strength. /n /n Lead Time (Processing/Shipping Handling Time): 1-2 Business days. Shipping from USA /c /n b/ Features: /b /n Material: ABS /n Diameter: 1.75 x 3 mm /n Weight: 1 kg (2.2 lb) /n Print temperature: 230-260 degrees /n
item.subdescription: Please purchase filaments as seperate order to get free shipping offer

item.title: PLA Filament
item.description: Our PLA Filament is a good material to start with because it’s easy to use and performs well on most prints. PLA filament is one of the most popular materials to print with, and for a reason! It is a harmless, good-looking due to the semi-transparency and strong material, and it is biodegradable. /n /n Lead Time (Processing/Shipping Handling Time): 1-2 Business days. Shipping from USA /c /n b/ Features: /b /n Material: PLA /n Diameter: 1.75 x 3 mm /n Weight: 1 kg (2.2 lb) /n Print temperature: 170-200 degrees /n
item.subdescription: Please purchase filaments as seperate order to get free shipping offer
